languages.text: Лорд-капитан, игнорируя протесты почтенных техножрецов, приказал{mf||а} не щадить инфраструктуру мира. Мы нанесли удар по священной капелле Магос Алхемис, вызвав выброс токсичного газа в атмосферу. Облако яда накрыло орудия врага, но еретики даже тогда не отступили. Когда мы, прорвавшись сквозь огонь, обрушились на их позиции, они были уже так измучены витающим в воздухе ядом, что и не помышляли о сопротивлении, сдаваясь в плен сотнями.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, игнорируя протесты почтенных техножрецов, приказал{mf||а} разбомбить священную капеллу Магос Алхемис, вызвав масштабный выброс убийственного токсичного газа в атмосферу. По мере распространения газа, плотный зенитный огонь, снимавший наши шаттлы один за другим, медленно затихал, пока не угас совсем. Потери среди десанта были существенными, но враг был деморализован и множество культистов сдались в плен еще до начала битвы.

languages.text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан, игнорируя протесты почтенных техножрецов, приказал{mf||а} не щадить инфраструктуру мира. Мы нанесли удар по священной капелле Магос Алхемис, вызвав выброс токсичного газа в атмосферу. Облако яда накрыло орудия врага, но еретики даже тогда не отступили. Когда мы, прорвавшись сквозь огонь, обрушились на их позиции, они были уже так измучены витающим в воздухе ядом, что и не помышляли о сопротивлении, сдаваясь в плен сотнями.

traits.locale_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chaplain of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

languages.text: 舰长大人不顾德高望重的技术神甫的抗议，下令将这个世界的基础设施列入到打击范围之中。我们攻击了炼金贤者的圣所，里面的有毒气体泄露出来。毒雾笼罩了敌人的阵地，但即便如此，那些异端分子也没有退缩。而当我们一路血战，终于冲到敌人的阵地时，他们已经被空气中的毒雾弄得虚弱不堪，无法采取任何抵抗。成百上千名异端分子就这么投降了。
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人不顾德高望重的技术祭司的抗议，下令将这个世界的基础设施列入到打击范围之中。我们攻击了炼金贤者的圣所，里面的有毒气体泄露出来。毒雾笼罩了敌人的阵地，但即便如此，那些异端分子也没有退缩。而当我们一路血战，终于冲到敌人的阵地时，他们已经被空气中的毒雾弄得虚弱不堪，无法采取任何抵抗。成百上千名异端分子就这么投降了。

languages.text: Ignorant les hauts cris des vénérables technoprêtres, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a donné l'ordre de ne pas épargner les infrastructures de la planète. Nous avons donc attaqué la chapelle sacrée du Magos Alchemys, ce qui a déclenché une émission de gaz toxique. Le nuage de poison a recouvert les positions de l'ennemi, mais les hérétiques ont refusé de se replier. Lorsque nous avons fini par les atteindre, le gaz les avait tellement affaiblis qu'ils se sont rendus par centaines sans nous opposer la moindre résistance.
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

traits.locale_text: Ignorant les hauts cris des vénérables technoprêtres, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a donné l'ordre de ne pas épargner les infrastructures de la planète. Nous avons donc attaqué la chapelle sacrée du magos alchemys, ce qui a déclenché une émission de gaz toxique. Le nuage de poison a recouvert les positions de l'ennemi, mais les hérétiques ont refusé de se replier. Lorsque nous avons fini par les atteindre, le gaz les avait tellement affaiblis qu'ils se sont rendus par centaines sans nous opposer la moindre résistance.

languages.text: 崇敬する技術司祭たちの抗議を無視し、ロード・キャプテンは惑星のインフラも破壊するように命令を下した。我々は錬金魔術団の聖なる教戒官を攻撃し、有毒ガスを放出させた。有害な雲は敵の陣地を覆い尽くしたが、それでも異端者たちを退却させることはできなかった。我々が敵の陣地まで道を切り開いたころには、彼らは空気中に漂うガスによって衰弱しており、我々に何の抵抗も示さず、数百人単位で降伏した。
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

traits.locale_text: 崇敬する技術司祭たちの抗議を無視し、ロード・キャプテンは惑星のインフラも破壊するように命令を下した。我々は錬金魔術団の聖なる教戒官を攻撃し、有毒ガスを放出させた。有害な雲は敵の陣地を覆い尽くしたが、それでも異端者たちを退却させることはできなかった。我々が敵の陣地まで道を切り開いたころには、彼らは空気中に漂うガスによって衰弱しており、我々に何の抵抗も示さず、数百人単位で降伏した。

languages.text: Ignorando las protestas de los venerables tecnosacerdotes, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó tratar la infraestructura del planeta como un sacrificio aceptable. Asaltamos la sagrada capilla del Magos Alchemys, desatando la emisión de gases tóxicos. La nube venenosa cubrió las posiciones del enemigo, pero eso no bastó para que se retiraran. Sin embargo, para cuando nos abrimos paso hasta ellos, el gas que llenaba el aire les había debilitado tanto que no pudieron resistirse y se rindieron a centenares.
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

traits.locale_text: Ignorando las protestas de los venerables tecnosacerdotes, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó tratar la infraestructura del planeta como un sacrificio aceptable. Asaltamos la sagrada capilla del Magos Alchemys, desatando la emisión de gases tóxicos. La nube venenosa cubrió las posiciones del enemigo, pero eso no bastó para que se retiraran. Sin embargo, para cuando nos abrimos paso hasta ellos, el gas que llenaba el aire les había debilitado tanto que no pudieron resistirse y se rindieron a centenares.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain ignorierte die Proteste der ehrwürdigen Techpriester und gab Befehl, die Infrastruktur der Welt nicht zu verschonen. Wir griffen die heilige Kapelle der Magos Alchemys durch eine Emission von Giftgas an. Die giftige Wolke legte sich über die feindlichen Stellungen, doch selbst dadurch zogen sich die Ketzer nicht zurück. Bis wir uns zu ihren Stellungen vorgekämpft hatten, waren sie von dem Gas in der Luft so geschwächt, dass sie keinen Widerstand leisteten und sich zu hunderten ergaben.
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain ignorierte die Proteste der ehrwürdigen Techpriester und gab Befehl, die Infrastruktur der Welt nicht zu verschonen. Wir griffen den heiligen Ordenspriester der Magos Alchemys durch eine Emission von Giftgas an. Die giftige Wolke legte sich über die feindlichen Stellungen, doch selbst dadurch zogen sich die Ketzer nicht zurück. Bis wir uns zu ihren Stellungen vorgekämpft hatten, waren sie von dem Gas in der Luft so geschwächt, dass sie keinen Widerstand leisteten und sich zu hunderten ergaben.

languages.text: Hürmet gören Tekno Rahiplerin ısrarlarını görmezden gelen Lord Kaptan, dünyanın altyapısının korunmayacağını söyledi. Magos Alşimis'in kutsal şapeline saldırarak zehirli gaz salınımını tetikledik. Zehirli bulutun düşman saflarını battaniye misali kaplamasına rağmen kâfirler, bu durumda dahi geri adım atmadı. Konumlarına ulaşmayı başardığımızda havayı dolduran gaz nedeniyle güçten düşmüşlerdi. Yüzlercesi, direnmeden teslim oldu.
languages.original_text: Ignoring the protests of the venerated Tech-Priests, the Lord Captain gave the order not to spare the world's infrastructure. We struck at the sacred chapel of the Magos Alchemys, triggering an emission of toxic gas. The noxious cloud blanketed the enemy's positions, but even that did not make the heretics retreat. By the time we had fought our way to their positions, they were so weakened by the gas that hung in the air that they showed us no resistance and surrendered by the hundreds.
